title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 459.11 - Medical emergencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 459.11 - Medical emergencies

State Regulations

Electric service to a residence shall not be terminated where
a medical doctor or local board of health has certified in writing that
termination of service will aggravate an existing medical emergency at a
customer's residence, provided that an initial certification by telephone is
authorized if written certification is received within the next five business
days. Notes

459.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
